titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to John B. Lindsay
CWG13807

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1865 Horse Settlements, Salaries, Ins. Bureau, Gen. Receipts, Correspondence Regarding Troops; Center Stack

body.p:
No. 22.
THE STATE OF KENTUCKY,
To John B Lindsay Dr

row.cell: To Services Rendered as asssistant Pay Master for the State of Kentucky, @ $100 per month, during the months of December 1864 and January 1865.

note.p: Approved, and the Q. M. Genl of Ky is ordered to pay Same out of Military fund.

Tho E Bramlette
Govr of Ky

body.p: I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Insp & Adjt Quarter-Master Gen. of Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 31 of Januy, 1865, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Two hundred Dollars and Cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)

No. 22.
No. 76 75 Abstract B Qr. 186.
Jno B. Lindsey
Dollars 200 x/100
Paid January 31, 1865.
